doc.previous: Countries requiring remaining validity of at least 1 month on arrival include Eritrea Hong Kong Macau and South Africa Other countries require either a passport valid on arrival or passport valid throughout the period of intended stay 33
doc.after: A rough standardization exists in types of passports throughout the world although passport types number of pages and definitions can vary by country
